definition: Nanling mountain, on the border of Hunan, Jiangxi, Guangdong and Guangxi
south
surname Nan
mountain range/mountain ridge

sentences.english: Southeast Hunan lies on the margin of central Naning Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 湘东南地区位于南岭中段北缘。

sentences.english: The Xitian tin orefield constitutes an important of the Nanling multi-metallic mineralized belt.
sentences.chinese: 锡田矿田属南岭成矿带的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The Nanling of South China is one of the most important areas of nonferrous metal mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 南岭地区是中国有色金属矿产资源重要基地之一。

definition: the five ranges separating Hunan and Jiangxi from south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi, namely: Dayu 大庾嶺|大庾岭[Da4 yu3 ling3], Dupang 都龐嶺|都庞岭[Du1 pang2 ling3], Qitian 騎田嶺|骑田岭[Qi2 tian2 ling3], Mengzhu 萌渚嶺|萌渚岭[Meng2 zhu3 ling3] and Yuecheng 越城嶺|越城岭[Yue4 cheng2 ling3]
mountain range/mountain ridge
Lianshan district of Huludao city 葫蘆島市|葫芦岛市, Liaoning
Yangshan county in Qingyuan 清远, Guangdong
Qitian mountain range between south Hunan and Guangdong
Fushan county in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi
Dragon mountain/Longshan district of Liaoyuan city 遼源市|辽源市, Jilin/Longshan county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan
south slope
Mt Danxia in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong/Danxia landform (red conglomerate and sandstone)
Nanshan or Namsan, common place name/Nanshan district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
a depression/cavity/hollow
variant of 坳[ao4]
Mengshan county in Wuzhou 梧州[Wu2 zhou1], Guangxi
